item.title: Builders cut prices and offer new home incentives as affordability gap shrinks

item.title: Nearly 1 in 4 American households living paycheck to paycheck, report reveals
item.description: A new Bank of America Institute report shows 24% of U.S. households live paycheck to paycheck in 2025, up from last year as inflation continues to out...

item.title: 5 on board American Airlines flight hospitalized after odor diverts plane
item.description: American Airlines Flight 2118 was diverted to Houston, Texas, after the crew "reported fumes in the flight deck and cabin," according to the FAA.

item.title: New car prices soar to historic high as buyers face mounting sticker shock
item.description: Car prices are nearing a historic milestone as the average cost of a new vehicle approaches $50,000, with buyers facing $766 monthly payments and risi...

item.title: Middle-income Americans pessimistic about their financial future amid persistent inflation, analysis shows
item.description: Study reveals only 21% of middle-income Americans expect better finances next year, down from 33% in 2020, as inflation creates widespread pessimism.
